title: Overview of Azure Blockchain | Azure Friday at Build 2018
excerpt: Azure Friday visited various Microsoft booths in the Expo Hall at Build 2018 to learn what's new. In this episode, Scott Hanselman gets an update on Azure Blockchain from Brenda Lee.  For more information, see:  • Azure Blockchain (docs) https://aka.ms/azfr/416/01  • Azure Blockchain Workbench https://aka.ms/azfr/416/02
